Trade/Device Name(s): SPOTCHECK Neonatal Total Galactose Microplate Reagent Kit
Specimen Container(s): Standardized filter paper (blood spot collection card)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SPOTCHECK Neonatal Total Galactose Microplate Reagent Kit for quantitation of total galactose in neonatal whole blood dried blood spots by enzymatic colorimetric assay.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative determination of total galactose (galactose plus galactose-1-phosphate) in whole blood dried blood spot samples to aid in neonatal screening for galactosemia, not for monitoring purposes.
